Articles.Content:
Today I was playing around with Ferram Aerospace and decided to try and build a small chain of SSTO's for fun. Here's the pictures of them. The first few pictures are of a kerbin-circumnavigating plane; cruising altitude 13km at around 900 m/s. The other SSTOs range from Mk1 being the least delta V to Mk3 which landed on Minmus. Hope you guys like them!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
